attributes.title: Absolute worst app in the App Store
attributes.review: Not only did this give my phone a virus, but it spammed my whole contact list with spam links and gave viruses to their phones. None of my apps work anymore and I can only call at 3 am on Tuesdays. Would not recommend this app.

attributes.title: Weird pop ups
attributes.review: I downloaded the app about a week ago and IMMEDIATELY it began to disrupt my life on the internet. I started to get advertisements for spray tanning near me, and weird emails about my next trip to Russia. Overall a bad experience and I am never downloading this again.
